channel.title: Online/Offline
channel.description: Well... I want if a Owner comes online, there comes a message on the screen (with sendMessage). If they logout, there comes a message (with sendMessage). Is this possible?

item.title: Online/Offline
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Pur3 Pk Ftw.
But I tried something other, but it don’t works. (Don’t look at the comment, it’s Dutch because I’m maaking it for someone that speaks Dutch):

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// public void RobinOnOff() { //Start van functie if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Robin")) { // Start if RobinOn(); } //Einde if else { //Start else RobinOff(); } //Einde else } //Einde functie /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// public void WafelOnOff() { //Start van functie if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Waf3ltje")) { //Start if WafelOn(); } //Einde if else { //Start else WafelOff(); } //Einde else } //Einde functie /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// public void RobinOn() { //Start van functie sendQuest("@gre@Online", 15896); } //Einde functie /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// public void RobinOff() { //Start van functie sendQuest("@red@Offline", 15896); } //Einde functie /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// public void WafelOn() { //Start van functie sendQuest("@gre@Online", 15903); } //Einde functie /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// public void WafelOff() { //Start van functie sendQuest("@red@Offline", 15903); } //Einde functie /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// I know that it can be easier…
But this is not always update…
So if he logs off, it stands there for 2 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Online/Offline
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Robintje1, post:7, topic:272262”]Should something like this work for logout & login?:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Waf3ltje")) { WafelOn(); } else { WafelOff(); }[/quote]

That would result in errors, as you probably don’t have the methods ‘WafelOff()’ and ‘WafelOn.’

Read full topic

item.title: Online/Offline
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Should something like this work for logout & login?:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Waf3ltje")) { WafelOn(); } else { WafelOff(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Online/Offline
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

No, i don’t think so
but you could find a way to do it by looking at the “Owner has logged in” message.

Read full topic
